about.text: Hello, my name is Michael, Iâ€™m <0>24 years old Full-Stack Developer with 6+ years of commercial experience.</0><1></1><1></1>I specialize in creating of <0>Web applications with AI Back-Ends</0> that are hosted and scaled using modern cloud providers and latest stack of technologies.<1></1><1></1>My goal is to become System Architect one day, now I'm <0>looking for new experience and interesting projects</0> to reach this target, hope we will have an opportunity to work together in future.

bf.description: AI-based fire detection system that works with live 360 degrees cameras. Web contains view for each active camera, detection list and large admin panel for elastic configuration of each camera unit.

wo.description: AI web tool for architects to perform takeoffs much faster. The project can be described as AutoCAD in browser with automatic AI detection of measures and different abilities for summaries/exports across document.

fs.description:
No code platform for training of AI models. Web system allows user to upload dataset, choose base model, set augmentation list and other additional configuration. After training each model can be tested
and downloaded as an Android application or as a RAW file.

ic.description: Commercial web site for one of the largest exporters company of Polymers, Fertilisers & Sulphur.

amdb.description: Site for Institute of Biology for storage, editing, searching and analysis researches and experiments.

portfolio.description: Portfolio site you are currently on.

hobbio.description: Social mobile app to find like-minded people, favorite places and events.
